game.name: Barbie The Pearl Princess Dress Up
game.description:
Barbie lovers are everywhere and seeking new ways to have fun with their favorite doll. If you are also one of them, give Barbie The Pearl Princess Dress Up game a try to enjoy some quality time with your favorite doll. Today the princess wants to become a beautiful mermaid, but she needs your support to help her ready for the prom. She has received the invitation from the popular royals prom tonight and does not want to compromise her look. 
Put your ultimate fashion skill and style sense to challenge to design her trendy outfit and hairstyle in this one of the best dressing games for girls! Remember the mermaid princess is blessed with a power to control pearls. Try to go through all the 7 category of dresses and accessories to make mermaid girls more gorgeous and beautiful! Her special pearl magic will allow you to have more fun. She has been waiting for your arrival in her pearl palace. Make sure to unveil her fabulous shiny secrets. 

This is a very special event for her. Change her hairstyle and browse through her wider collection of dresses and accessories to make her look perfect in this html5 princess dress up game! Give her a nice top and combine her with some matching crown and jewelries! Do not forget to give her a new matching mermaid tail to allow the princess to practice some magic. Dress her up in a mermaid style in this cool mermaid game! Enjoy your day with other beautiful princesses in our more girls games, no download required!
